plugin.description: A space-separated list of one or more asdf plugins to install. Additionally, version and/or repository can be specified in the format 'name:version@repo'. If version is excluded, latest is assumed. If repo is excluded, https://github.com/asdf-vm/asdf-plugins is assumed. If you are installing multiple versions of the same plugin, the last one in this list will be set as global version.

latestVersionPattern.description: this will be used as argument for 'asdf latest <plugin> <latestVersionPattern>' command. If none given the default asdf of '[0-9]' will be used.
